original_title: Rick Steves' Andalucía: The Best of Southern Spain
overview: Join Rick as he weaves Andalucía's rich mix of culture, cuisine, history, and natural wonders into a 60-minute special. The hour includes the major cities of Sevilla, Córdoba, and Granada; flamenco, sherry, and horses; dramatic white-washed hill towns; and fun in the Costa del Sol sun — plus a dash of Britain in Gibraltar.
title: Rick Steves' Andalucía: The Best of Southern Spain
